high_descs: Move to the wood desk that is to the left of the silver trash can
Pick up the black mug on the desk
Turn around in a full circle until you are facing the desk again
anns.task_desc: Pick up a mug from a desk and turn on the lamp

high_descs: Turn left, cross the room towards the wall and hang a right at the end of the couch to reach the large desk.
Pick up the black mug to the right of the keys on top of the desk.
Turn around to face the couch, hang a left until you reach the wall and turn right to face the large desk.
Turn on the small lamp in the back left corner on top of the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a mug by the light of a small lamp.

high_descs: Turn left and go to the desk.
anns.task_desc: Look at the mug in the lamp light.
